text:
“誠軒”位於交通便利的尖沙咀核心地帶，設計靈感源於維多利亞港，流線型的設計元素貫穿始終，整體裝潢徬彿將海水的動感與活力引入室內，延續國際都市的靈動與活力。 180°全景落地玻璃，盡攬維港美景，讓您在品嘗酒店星級美點的同時，享受維港的璀璨景致！ 我們的專業團隊，隨時為您策劃專屬的保險與理財管理方案！
“誠軒” —誠摯期待為您策劃理想未來！
#保誠 #PrudentialHongKong #保誠保險 #誠軒
trans:
"Chengxuan" is located in the core area of Tsim Sha Tsui with convenient transportation. Its design is inspired by Victoria Harbour. Streamlined design elements can be found throughout, and the overall interior brings the movement and vitality of the sea indoor, extending the agility and vitality of an international city. The 180° panoramic floor-to-ceiling glass provides an expansive view of Victoria Harbor, allowing you to enjoy the dazzling scenery of Victoria Harbor while savoring the hotel's star-rated delicacies! Our professional team is ready to plan exclusive insurance and financial management solutions for you!
"Chengxuan" - sincerely looking forward to planning your ideal future!
#Prudential #PrudentialHongKong #Prudential Insurance #Chengxuan
